title: When Lightning Strikes
description: She's a cursed witch. He's a wolf shifter and her sworn enemy. Every rose has its fangsâ€¦Lightning Credence knows she's destined to succumb to her family's curse. As her escort service begins to crumble, only one person can come to her rescue.Wolf Shifter Ryker Alfero is everything Lightning craves and everything she shouldn't want.
